ai-assistant.i18n.enabled.description: Enable React i18n IntelliSense (hover, go to definition, completions for translation keys).

ai-assistant.i18n.defaultLocale.description: Default locale used for hover/definition and when multiple locales are present.

ai-assistant.i18n.localeGlobs.description: Glob patterns (relative to each workspace folder) used to discover locale JSON files.

ai-assistant.i18n.autoTranslate.description: When converting selections to keys, use AI to suggest translations for non-default locales.

ai-assistant.i18n.tImportPath.description: Module path used when inserting `import { t } from '...'` for React i18n helpers.

ai-assistant.openaiApiKey.description: OpenAI API key used for AI-powered translations. Store this in your user or workspace settings; do not commit it to source control.

ai-assistant.openaiModel.description: OpenAI model ID to use for AI translations (for example, gpt-4o-mini).

ai-assistant.i18n.autoMonitor.description: Automatically monitor files for translation-eligible content and trigger extraction/rewrite when files are committed to git.

ai-assistant.i18n.autoExtract.description: Automatically run extraction script when new translatable content is detected and committed.

ai-assistant.i18n.autoRewrite.description: Automatically run rewrite script after extraction to replace hard-coded strings with translation keys.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
